entry.title: 吴恩达机器学习-第[2]周
entry.content:
Multivariate Linear Regression

Multiple Features

Notation:

n = number of features.

x(i)x^{(i)}x(i) = input (features) of ithi^{t h}ith training expample.

xj(i)x_{j}^{(i)}xj(i)​ = value of feature jjj In ithi^{t h}ith training example.

Hypothesis:

​Previously:hθ(x)=θ0+θ1xh_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} xhθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x

​Now:hθ(x)=θ0+θ1x1+θ2x2+⋯+θnxnh_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} x_{1}+\theta_{2} x_{2}+\cdots+\theta_{n} x_{n}hθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x1​+θ2​x2​+⋯+θn​xn​

For convenience of notation, define x0x_0x0​ = 1.

Using the definition of matrix multiplication, our multivariable hypothesis function can be concisely represented as:

hθ(x)=[θ0θ1…θn][x0x1⋮xn]=θTxh_{\theta}(x)=\left[\begin{array}{llll}\theta_{0} & \theta_{1} & \ldots & \theta_{n}\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{c}x_{0} \\x_{1} \\\vdots \\x_{n}\end{array}\right]=\theta^{T} xhθ​(x)=[θ0​​θ1​​…​θn​​]⎣⎢⎢⎢⎡​x0​x1​⋮xn​​⎦⎥⎥⎥⎤​=θTx

Gradient Descent for Multiple Variables

Hypothesis:hθ(x)=θTx=θ0x0+θ1x1+θ2x2+⋯+θnxnh_{\theta}(x)=\theta^{T} x=\theta_{0} x_{0}+\theta_{1} x_{1}+\theta_{2} x_{2}+\cdots+\theta_{n} x_{n}hθ​(x)=θTx=θ0​x0​+θ1​x1​+θ2​x2​+⋯+θn​xn​

Parameters:θ0,θ1,…,θn\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}, \ldots, \theta_{n}θ0​,θ1​,…,θn​ ——> a θ\thetaθ vector

Cost function:

J(θ0,θ1,…,θn)=12m∑i=1m(hθ(x(i))−y(i))2J\left(\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}, \ldots, \theta_{n}\right)=\frac{1}{2 m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x^{(i)}\right)-y^{(i)}\right)^{2}J(θ0​,θ1​,…,θn​)=2m1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(x(i))−y(i))2

Gradient descent:

​Previously(n=1):

​Repeat {

​θj:=θj−α∂∂θjJ(θ0,…,θn)\theta_{j}:=\theta_{j}-\alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta_{j}} J\left(\theta_{0}, \ldots, \theta_{n}\right)θj​:=θj​−α∂θj​∂​J(θ0​,…,θn​)

​}

Update rule:

Repeat {

​θj:=θj−α1m∑i=1m(hθ(x(i))−y(i))xj(i)\theta_{j}:=\theta_{j}-\alpha \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x^{(i)}\right)-y^{(i)}\right) x_{j}^{(i)}θj​:=θj​−αm1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(x(i))−y(i))xj(i)​

​(simultaneously update θj\theta_jθj​ for jjj = 0, . . . , nnn)

}

Gradient Descent in Practice I - Feature Scaling

Feature Scaling

Idea: Make sure features are on a similar scale

E.g. x1x_1x1​ = size (0-2000 feet2^22) transform to  size (feet 2 ) 2000\frac{\text { size (feet }^{2} \text { ) }}{2000}2000 size (feet 2 ) ​

​x2x_2x2​ = number of bedrooms(1-5) transform to x2= number of bedrooms 5x_{2}=\frac{\text { number of bedrooms }}{5}x2​=5 number of bedrooms ​

Get every feature into approximately a −1≤xi≤1-1 \leq x_{i} \leq 1−1≤xi​≤1 range.

Mean normalization(均值归一化)

Replace xix_ixi​ with xix_ixi​ - μi\mu_{i}μi​ (average value of x in the training set) to make features have approximately zero mean(Do not apply to x0x_0x0​ = 1).

E.g.x1= size −10002000x_{1}=\frac{\text { size }-1000}{2000}x1​=2000 size −1000​

​ x2=#bedrooms−25x_{2}=\frac{\# b e d r o o m s-2}{5}x2​=5#bedrooms−2​

​−0.5≤x1≤0.5,−0.5≤x2≤0.5-0.5 \leq x_{1} \leq 0.5,-0.5 \leq x_{2} \leq 0.5−0.5≤x1​≤0.5,−0.5≤x2​≤0.5

Gradient Descent in Practice II - Learning Rate

Gradient descent:

​θj:=θj−α∂∂θjJ(θ)\theta_{j}:=\theta_{j}-\alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta_{j}} J(\theta)θj​:=θj​−α∂θj​∂​J(θ)

  • “Debugging”: How to make sure gradient descent is working correctly.
  • if α\alphaα is too small: slow convergence.
  • if α\alphaα is too large: J(θ)J(\theta)J(θ) May not decrease on every iteration; may not converge.
  • How to choose learning rate α\alphaα.

Features and Polynomial Regression

Housing prices prediction

hθ(x)=θ0+θ1× frontage +θ2× depth h_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} \times \text { frontage }+\theta_{2} \times \text { depth }hθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​× frontage +θ2​× depth 

Polynomial Regression

hθ(x)=θ0+θ1x1+θ2x12h_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} x_{1}+\theta_{2} x_{1}^{2}hθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x1​+θ2​x12​

hθ(x)=θ0+θ1x1+θ2x12+θ3x13h_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} x_{1}+\theta_{2} x_{1}^{2}+\theta_{3} x_{1}^{3}hθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x1​+θ2​x12​+θ3​x13​

hθ(x)=θ0+θ1x1+θ2x1h_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} x_{1}+\theta_{2} \sqrt{x_{1}}hθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x1​+θ2​x1​​

Conputing Parameters Analytically

Normal Equation(正规方程)

Method to solve for θ\thetaθ analytically.(one step)

θ∈Rn+1J(θ0,θ1,…,θm)=12m∑i=1m(hθ(x(i))−y(i))2\theta \in \mathbb{R}^{n+1} \quad J\left(\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}, \ldots, \theta_{m}\right)=\frac{1}{2 m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x^{(i)}\right)-y^{(i)}\right)^{2}θ∈Rn+1J(θ0​,θ1​,…,θm​)=2m1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(x(i))−y(i))2

∂∂θiJ(θ)=⋯=0\frac{\partial}{\partial \theta_{i}} J(\theta)=\cdots=0∂θi​∂​J(θ)=⋯=0 (for every jjj)

solve for θ0,θ1,…,θn\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}, \ldots, \theta_{n}θ0​,θ1​,…,θn​

Examples: m = 4.

X=[12104514511416324011534323018522136]X=\left[\begin{array}{ccccc}1 & 2104 & 5 & 1 & 45 \\1 & 1416 & 3 & 2 & 40 \\1 & 1534 & 3 & 2 & 30 \\1 & 852 & 2 & 1 & 36\end{array}\right]X=⎣⎢⎢⎡​1111​210414161534852​5332​1221​45403036​⎦⎥⎥⎤​ y=[460232315178]y=\left[\begin{array}{l}460 \\232 \\315 \\178\end{array}\right]y=⎣⎢⎢⎡​460232315178​⎦⎥⎥⎤​

θ=(XTX)−1XTy\theta=\left(X^{T} X\right)^{-1} X^{T} yθ=(XTX)−1XTy

Normal Equation Noninvertibility(不可逆性)

entry.title: 吴恩达机器学习-第[1]周
entry.content:
Supervised learning

Housing price prediction

Given the “right answer”
regression problem→回归问题在：预测一个连续的值输出
By 直线拟合、二次拟合
How to decide
Breast cancer（malignant or benign）
classification problem（分类问题） Discrete output(0 or 1)

Unsupervised learning

All datasets are the same

Do not know what is the correct answer
Cluster algorithm
Group individuals into different categories or others.

Cocktail party problem

[W,s,v]=svd⁡((repmat⁡(sum⁡(x.∗x,1),size⁡(x,1),1)⋅∗x)∗x′)[\mathrm{W}, \mathrm{s}, \mathrm{v}]=\operatorname{svd}\left(\left(\operatorname{repmat}\left(\operatorname{sum}\left(\mathrm{x} .^{*} \mathrm{x}, 1\right), \operatorname{size}(\mathrm{x}, 1), 1\right) \cdot{ }^{*} \mathrm{x}\right)^{*} \mathrm{x}^{\prime}\right)[W,s,v]=svd((repmat(sum(x.∗x,1),size(x,1),1)⋅∗x)∗x′)
svd:奇异值分解 内置在Octave中

Training set

Notation

m = Number of training examples
x‘s = “input” variable / features
y‘s = “output” variable / “target” variable
Hypothesis:
hθ(x)=θ0+θ1xh_{\theta}(x)=\theta_{0}+\theta_{1} xhθ​(x)=θ0​+θ1​x
θi′s\theta_{i^{\prime} \mathrm{s}}θi′s​: Parameters of the model（How to choose？）

Cost function（代价函数 or 平方误差函数）

平方差代价函数（most common）

J(θ0,θ1)=12m∑i=1m(y^i−yi)2=12m∑i=1m(hθ(xi)−yi)2J\left(\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}\right)=\frac{1}{2 m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(\hat{y}_{i}-y_{i}\right)^{2}=\frac{1}{2 m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x_{i}\right)-y_{i}\right)^{2}J(θ0​,θ1​)=2m1​∑i=1m​(y^​i​−yi​)2=2m1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(xi​)−yi​)2
And our goal：obtain minimize⁡θ0,θ1J(θ0,θ1)\operatorname{minimize}_{\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}} J\left(\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}\right)minimizeθ0​,θ1​​J(θ0​,θ1​)
How to minimize？
Gradient descent（梯度下降）：
repeat until convergence {
θj:=θj−α∂∂θjJ(θ0,θ1)( for j=0 and j=1)\theta_{j}:=\theta_{j}-\alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta_{j}} J\left(\theta_{0}, \theta_{1}\right) \quad(\text { for } j=0 \text { and } j=1)θj​:=θj​−α∂θj​∂​J(θ0​,θ1​)( for j=0 and j=1)
}
:= ——> Assignment（赋值）
= ——> Truth assertion
α\alphaα ——> learning rate（控制以多大幅度更新参数）

Gradient descent For Linear Regression

repeat until convergence {
θ0:=θ0−α1m∑i=1m(hθ(x(i))−y(i))\theta_{0}:=\theta_{0}-\alpha \frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x^{(i)}\right)-y^{(i)}\right)θ0​:=θ0​−αm1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(x(i))−y(i))
θ1:=θ1−α1m∑i=1m(hθ(x(i))−y(i))⋅x(i)\theta_{1}:=\theta_{1}-\alpha \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m}\left(h_{\theta}\left(x^{(i)}\right)-y^{(i)}\right) \cdot x^{(i)}θ1​:=θ1​−αm1​∑i=1m​(hθ​(x(i))−y(i))⋅x(i)
}

Linear Algebra Review:

Matrices and Vectors（矩阵和向量）
Matrix
Vector:An n x 1 matrix
Addition and Scalar Multiplication
Scalar means real number
Matrix Vector Multiplication
Matrix-matrix Multiplication
Matrix Multiplication Properties
Inverse and Transpose（逆矩阵 and 转置）

Supervised learning

Housing price prediction

regression problem→回归问题在：预测一个连续的值输出

How to decide
Breast cancer（malignant or benign）
classification problem（分类问题） Discrete output(0 or 1)

All datasets are the same

Do not know what is the correct answer
Cluster algorithm
Group individuals into different categories or others.

Cocktail party problem

svd:奇异值分解 内置在Octave中

entry.title: 为hexo-Chic主题添加自定义icon
entry.content:
前言

由于Chic中的样式基本为文字构成，为了做一些美化，且Chic提供的iconfont矢量图标较少，我想要寻找一种能够导入自己喜欢图标的方法。iconfont上有非常多精美的矢量图标，所以我将基于这个网站来实现我的目标。

具体操作

1.建立项目
找到你想添加的图标，将你想要添加的图标点击 “添加入库” 按钮。

2.添加至项目
点击右上角小购物车图标。这里会看到你刚刚添加的所有图标。

接下来就是为你的图标创建一个项目，名称随意。创建完成后你将看到如下页面。

3.生成在线链接
点击 Font class 按钮然后生成链接。

4.修改Chic主题配置文件
复制第3步生成的在线链接，找到themes/Chic/_partial/head.ejs，在该文件中找到，新增<link rel="stylesheet" href="//at.alicdn.com/t/font_2932977_r09dyogs5xa.css">这段代码，href中的内容即为生成的在线链接。自此，你已经可以根据适量图标的名称在你的博客中进行调用了。

效果展示

参考链接：

  • 别再用FontAwesome了！
entry.summary:
前言

由于Chic中的样式基本为文字构成，为了做一些美化，且Chic提供的iconfont矢量图标
